languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас удивленный и неожиданно печальный взгляд. Спустя пару секунд сомнений он едва слышно начинает говорить:{/n} "Если быть откровенным, я..."
{n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас удивленный и неожиданно печальный взгляд. Спустя пару секунд сомнений он едва слышно начинает говорить:{/n} "Если быть откровенным, я..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada sorprendida y triste. Tras unos segundos de duda, murmura:{/n} «A decir verdad...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada sorprendida y triste. Tras unos segundos de duda, murmura:{/n} «A decir verdad...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは驚き、予期せぬ悲しい表情を見せた。数秒間、躊躇した後、彼は低い声でつぶやいた。{/n}「お、俺は…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは驚き、予期せぬ悲しい表情を見せた。数秒間、躊躇した後、彼は低い声でつぶやいた。{/n}「お、俺は…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希看了你一眼，目光中既带有惊讶，又有悲伤之色。他犹豫片刻，低声开口。{/n}“说实话，我……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看了你一眼，目光中既带有惊讶，又有悲伤之色。他犹豫片刻，低声开口。{/n}“说实话，我……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard surpris et étonnamment triste. Après quelques secondes d'hésitation, il murmure :{/n} « En toute franchise, je... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard surpris et étonnamment triste. Après quelques secondes d'hésitation, il murmure :{/n} « En toute franchise, je... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen überraschten und unerwarteten traurigen Blick zu. Nach einigen Sekunden des Zögerns murmelt er leise:{/n} "Ehrlich gesagt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen überraschten und unerwarteten traurigen Blick zu. Nach einigen Sekunden des Zögerns murmelt er leise:{/n} "Ehrlich gesagt ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, sana şaşkınlık ve hiç beklemediğin bir hüzünle dolu bir bakış atıyor. Tereddütle geçen birkaç saniyenin ardından kısık bir sesle mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Dürüst olmam gerekirse ben..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a surprised and unexpectedly sad look. After a few seconds of hesitation, he says in a low murmur,{/n} "To be honest, I..."
